## Description
Assume each solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) can generate 200W&#10;&#9;&#9;with the achievement of 1kWh/kg. Weight: 200W * 1kWh/kg &#61; 0.2 kg&#10;&#9;&#9;

|Mass:|0.2 kg|
